name: Mystic India Pop-Classic pop game
description:
Pop over to India for a mysterious elephant safari...

Shoot to pop matching clusters of 3 or more balls from the string. Get rid of 'em before they reach the end of the string...or it's game over!

How to Play:
1 conventional pop rules unchanged, adding more scenes.
2 click on the middle of the elephant, which can realize the rapid transformation of different colors balls.
